name: Potatiana Jones
description:
In this puzzle platformer you plant seeds to grow plants to your advantage, plant a vine to climb higher/lower, plant a dense block of grass to block a path or fill a gap, or plant a bombplant to blow up vulnerable blocks!

Controls:
W - Look Up/Move Up
A,D - Move Left/Right
Q,E - Cycle selected seed!
R - Restart Level

Left Mouse Button (LMB) - Fire seed!
